definition: to no avail/achieving nothing/totally ineffective/to have no effect/to fall flat (esp. of joke or speech that is completely ignored)
hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan

sentences.english: I tried losing weight,but nothing wored.
sentences.chinese: 我曾試着減肥，但是毫無效果。

sentences.english: They protested to the President but in vain.
sentences.chinese: 他們向董事長提抗議，但毫無效果。

sentences.english: I tried losing heaviness, but naught worked.
sentences.chinese: 我曾試擆減肥，但是毫無效果。

sentences.english: I tried losing weight， but nothing worked.
sentences.chinese: 我曾試着減肥，但是毫無效果。

sentences.english: Other manufacturers' approaches, meanwhile, smack of helplessness.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，其他廠商採取的辦法則毫無效果。
